title: Saki Achiga-hen: Episode of Side-A (Saki Episode of Side A)
synopsis: The Achiga Girls' Academy in Nara once defeated regional mahjong powerhouse Bansei High School. It advanced into the national team semifinals but lost to the eventual champion, and the mahjong club was later disbanded.
